game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that a powerful artifact is buried deep within an abandoned temple. Your quest is to retrieve it and bring it back to the village elder.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the abandoned temple.
task.description: You must search the dense forest to the east for any signs of the forgotten ruins.

task.objective: Enter the temple and navigate its traps.
task.description: The entrance is sealed with an ancient mechanism. Figure out how to activate it and be cautious of the traps inside.

task.objective: Find the artifact and bring it back safely.
task.description: The artifact is said to be in the innermost chamber. Retrieve it, avoid any curses, and make your way out.
